Common.Highlight.Common.Text: + Situated on Belvidere’s main retail corridor at the SE corner of Chrysler Dr. (US Hwy. 20) and Genoa Rd.
Walmart out lots with off-site detention
Surrounding retailers and businesses include Walmart, Applebees, Subway, Starbucks, Aaron’s, Midland States Bank, Physcians Immediate Care, Verizon and OSF Healthcare
Minutes away from Boone County schools andresidential neighborhoods
